name: Entrance to the Catacomb
description:
You reach the entrance of an old catacomb. You still wonder how you got here in the first place. The heavy wooden door is wide open and you can still hear noises from inside.

A rusty old shield lies on the ground.

exits.name: south
exits.description: Follow the door to the right

detail: You look closer to all sides of the room. After a thorough investigation you can see that parts of a wall are made up of loose rocks. You might be able to [move] these rocks.
name: Pathway into Darkness
description: As you step through the catacomb entrance you stand in a narrow passage that only leads north. The air smells moldy and the walls are wet and grown over. You see plenty of rocks on both sides of the wall.

actions.name: move rocks
actions.description: {{characterName}} trys to move one of the medium sized rocks. Parts of the wall start to crumble and a [hidden path] opens up.

exits.name: north
exits.description: Follow the door to the left

exits.name: hidden path
exits.description: You follow the hidden path on the east wall

detail: You look closer to all sides of the room.
name: Chamber of Sorrows
description:
You are entering a dark muddy room...
On the walls you can see clear signs of past bloodshed. Something bad happend in here, something really bad. You ask yourself, where do you go from here?

actions.name: move rocks
actions.description: You try to move one of the medium sized rocks. Parts of the wall start to crumble and a hidden path opens up.

exits.name: north
exits.description: Follow the door to the left

name: Entrance to Oldtown
description: You reach the gates of Oldtown. A long forgotten village of fishersman and sword craftsmen.

detail: You can see shops on all sides and even wandering merchants. Watch out for the thieve kids as you might lose a coin or two when you encounter them.
name: The main street of old town
description: As you pass through the gates you find yourself on a very busy street. The main street of old town leading up in the distance to the castle.

exits.name: griphon
exits.description: Enter the Old Feisty Griphon Inn

detail: You can see three rows of tables with chairs on both sides each
name: Old Feisty Griphon
description:
As you enter the pub. ...

you can feel the alcohol in the air - as you breath your lungs fill with stink of rum and beer.

name: The Weasponsmith
description: As you enter the smith you can see many gloriful swords and shields hanging on the wall.

name: Secret chamber
description: As you step through the newly created pathway you find yourself in a secret chamber

exits.name: leave
exits.description: You get back to the pathway
